response.body:
{
    "result": [
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 1,
            "leopardTypeId": 1,
            "leopardName": "Panthera tigris tigris",
            "weight": 35,
            "characteristics": "The leopard possesses a tawny or rusty yellow-colored coat with close-set rosettes and dark spots",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 2,
            "leopardTypeId": 1,
            "leopardName": "Nepalaliis",
            "weight": 22,
            "characteristics": "Females of this subspecies weigh around 29 kg, and males weigh around 56 kg",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 3,
            "leopardTypeId": 1,
            "leopardName": "Bhutanient",
            "weight": 39,
            "characteristics": "The Sri Lankan leopard has historically been found across a wide range of habitats on the island nation including arid scrub jungle, rainforest, upper highland forest, and dry evergreen monsoon forest",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 4,
            "leopardTypeId": 2,
            "leopardName": "Bengal",
            "weight": 33,
            "characteristics": "The leopards are either completely black due to a recessive phenotype or have the usual spotted coat",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 5,
            "leopardTypeId": 2,
            "leopardName": "Ekaterina",
            "weight": 30,
            "characteristics": "The Javan leopard is critically endangered, and only about 250 individuals survive in protected habitats in their range",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 6,
            "leopardTypeId": 2,
            "leopardName": "Sierra",
            "weight": 31,
            "characteristics": "Depletion of the prey base, poaching, habitat loss and also conflicts with humans have resulted in a rapid downfall in the numbers of the Javan leopard",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 7,
            "leopardTypeId": 3,
            "leopardName": "Panthera",
            "weight": 17,
            "characteristics": "Like most other wildlife in the region, the leopard faces threats due to habitat loss and poaching for illegal wildlife trade",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 8,
            "leopardTypeId": 3,
            "leopardName": "Sumatra",
            "weight": 20,
            "characteristics": "A report produced in 2016 came as a shock to conservationists since it revealed that there are only about 400 to 1,000 breeding adults of the Indochinese leopard left in the wild",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        },
        {
            "leopardProfileId": 9,
            "leopardTypeId": 3,
            "leopardName": "Baliance",
            "weight": 20,
            "characteristics": "The Indochinese leopard appears in a predominantly black form south of the Kra Isthmus and a predominantly spotted form north of the Isthmus",
            "careNeeds": "These animals are classified as endangered by the IUCN",
            "modifiedDate": "2025-06-20T00:00:00"
        }
    ]
}
